dialogue.intro: "Perfection is the enemy of good! We simply do not have the luxury of time to polish this to whatever gold standard you're proposing. We need to merge Ghoul!"

You walk up to Sarah, who is busy tapping away on her IPhone. You start to ask why she deleted your code, when she interrupts you and says,
"My team is still waiting for your team to implement Ghoul so we can do our features, but for some reason your team keeps on dragging your feet. Maybe you're not prioritizing correctly? Or maybe you're just not used to supporting a project this important?"
Before you can reply, Steve calls you over to discuss your project timeline.
dialogue.cont: No more time to talk, Steve wants to talk about the project timeline.
